data.description: Module to capture output from XML::Writer
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I wrote this module to provide just the required methods for
    capturing data from the XML::Writer module. It requires no other
    modules and is pure Perl making it easy to install and platform
    independant.

    Other modules which provide simillar (enhanced) functionality to
    this module as detailed above are non-core modules and have other
    module requirements or larger footprints.

    -- Simon Oliver
